/** * A parsing exception. This exception is different from the standard * XNI exception in that it stores the location in the document (or * its entities) where the exception occurred. * * @author Andy Clark, IBM * * @version $Id: XMLParseException.java,v 1.8 2004/09/02 03:53:53 mrglavas Exp $ */
